brkr.diceEnabled.name: Enable Better Rolls
brkr.diceEnabled.hint: Enables the improved dice outputs for DnD5e. Affects all ability checks, saving throws, items, spells, and features on the sheet. Requires reopening the sheet.
brkr.queryAdvantageEnabled.name: Query for (Dis)Advantage
brkr.queryAdvantageEnabled.hint: Adds a Query for Advantage/Normal/Disadvantage roll types. Ctrl + Shift may still be used.
brkr.rollButtonsEnabled.name: Add Roll Buttons to Sheet
brkr.rollButtonsEnabled.hint: Adds buttons to items, spells, and features in the sheet, which display when the item is expanded. May be incompatible with the Item Sheet Buttons mod. Requires reopening the sheet.
brkr.imageButtonEnabled.name: Make Item Image Auto-roll
brkr.imageButtonEnabled.hint: When clicking on an item's image, output a Better Roll message to chat instead of the normal chat output. Can be bypassed by holding Alt when clicking.
brkr.quickDefaultDescriptionEnabled.name: Quick Roll Description Enabled by Default
brkr.quickDefaultDescriptionEnabled.hint: If enabled, weapons and tools will have their descriptions show by default on quick rolls. Only affects new weapons and tools, as other item types already have descriptions enabled by default.
brkr.defaultRollArt.name: Use Default Art
brkr.defaultRollArt.hint: Determines which art is used by default for ability checks and saving throws. If this is not available (or is the default mystery man icon), it will use the other icon instead.
brkr.damageContextEnabled.name: Damage Context Labels
brkr.damageContextEnabled.hint: Allows entering context for damage labels, which precede the damage type. Only works on Better Rolls.
brkr.contextReplacesTitle.name: Context Replaces Title Label
brkr.contextReplacesTitle.hint: If a context label is in the same place as a damage roll's title label, such as "Damage" or "Healing", it will replace it.
brkr.contextReplacesDamage.name: Context Replaces Damage Type
brkr.contextReplacesDamage.hint: If a context label is in the same place as a damage type label, it will replace it.
brkr.rollTitlePlacement.name: Show Roll Title Labels
brkr.rollTitlePlacement.hint: Determines if a non-damage roll's title, such as "Attack", appear.
brkr.damageTitlePlacement.name: Show Damage Title Labels
brkr.damageTitlePlacement.hint: Determines if a damage roll's title, such as "Damage", appears.
brkr.damageRollPlacement.name: Show Damage Type Labels
brkr.damageRollPlacement.hint: Determines where the damage type label is placed, relative to a damage roll.
brkr.altSecondaryEnabled.name: Alt-Click Image for Secondary Roll
brkr.altSecondaryEnabled.hint: When Alt-clicking on an item's image, output a second Better Roll message which can be configured separately per-item. Overwrites ability to bypass with default chat output.
brkr.chatDamageButtonsEnabled.name: Enable Chat Damage Buttons
brkr.chatDamageButtonsEnabled.hint: Renders buttons on Better Rolls damage rolls that apply damage to selected tokens. Requires refreshing Foundry.
brkr.playRollSounds.name: Enable Roll Sounds
brkr.playRollSounds.hint: Plays a dice-rolling sound when a Better Rolls message is sent to chat. Wlll not play if Maestro's Item Track are enabled.
brkr.hideDC.name: Hide Save DCs
brkr.hideDC.hint: Determines if the DC is hidden on save DC buttons on Better Rolls.
brkr.d20Mode.name: d20 Mode
brkr.d20Mode.hint: Determines how attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws are shown.
brkr.d20Mode.choices.3: ゴゴ Triple Threat ゴゴ
brkr.critBehavior.name: Critical Damage
brkr.critBehavior.hint: Determines how critical damage is calculated.
brkr.critString.name: Critical Indicator
brkr.critString.hint: Determines how criticals are labeled. Appears as text to the right of the critical damage roll. Only works on Better Rolls.
brkr.error.noSelectedActor: Must have a character selected to use this macro!
brkr.error.noKnownItemOnActor: does not own an item named
brkr.error.noActorWithId: No actor is known with that ID
brkr.error.noActorWithName: No actor is known with that name
brkr.error.noItemWithId: No item is known with that ID on actor
brkr.error.noChargesLeft: This item has run out of charges!
brkr.error.autoDestroy: The {name} disappears as its last charge is consumed.
brkr.settings.critDamage.hint: Extra Critical Damage to apply when at least one damage is rolled
brkr.settings.quickRollsAltSubLabel: (When holding Alt during a quick roll)
brkr.settings.label: Label
brkr.querying.title: What type of roll?
brkr.chat.damageButtons.fullDamage.hint: Click to apply full damage to selected token(s).
brkr.chat.damageButtons.halfDamage.hint: Click to apply half damage to selected token(s).
brkr.chat.damageButtons.doubleDamage.hin: Click to apply double damage to selected token(s).
brkr.chat.damageButtons.healing.hint: Click to apply full healing to selected token(s).
brkr.chat.damageButtons.critPrompt.title: Use Crit Damage?
